SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection

Class SmtpFoundation

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.connection.SmtpFoundation
Direct Known Subclasses:
Connection
public abstract class SmtpFoundation extends Object
SMTP foundation for socket reads and writes.

Provides basic socket functionalities for building SMTP servers and clients.

See Also:
  • Connection
  • RFC 5321

    • EXTENDEDTIMEOUT

      public static final int EXTENDEDTIMEOUT
      Socket extended timeout in milliseconds.

      Used for extendedRead().

      Handy for SMTP DATA and BDAT extensions.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • readBytes

      public void readBytes(int bytesToRead, OutputStream outputStream) throws IOException
      Read fixed number of bytes from socket.
      Parameters:
      bytesToRead - Number of bytes to read.
      outputStream - OutputStream instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.

    • readMultiline

      public void readMultiline(OutputStream out, int emailSizeLimit) throws IOException, LimitExceededException
      Read multiline data from socket to given output stream.

      To remove the <CRLF>.<CRLF> terminator we need to keep EOL's.

      This lets us check previous line endings + current line for the terminator as per RFC 5321.

      Parameters:
      out - OutputStream instance.
      emailSizeLimit - Email size limit.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.
      LimitExceededException - Email size limit exceeded.

    • isTerminator

      private boolean isTerminator(byte[]... arrays)
      Is fullstop.

      Check given byte arrays form <CRLF>.<CRLF> terminator sequence.

      Parameters:
      arrays - Byte arrays.
      Returns:
      Boolean.

    • getEol

      public byte[] getEol(byte[] bytes)
      Gets EOL.

      Gets EOL bytes from given byte array.

      Parameters:
      bytes - Byte array.
      Returns:
      Byte array.

    • trimBytes

      public byte[] trimBytes(byte[] bytes, int count)

      count - Integer.

    • write

      public void write(byte[] bytes) throws IOException
      Write bytes to a socket via the instance DataOutputStream.
      Parameters:
      bytes - String to write to socket.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.

    • write

      public void write(byte[] bytes, boolean chunkWrite, int slowBytes, int slowWait) throws IOException
      Write to a socket via the instance DataOutputStream.

      Used for BDAT deliveries.

      Parameters:
      bytes - String to write to socket.
      chunkWrite - True to chunk string into multiple uneven writes.
      slowBytes - Size of bytes.
      slowWait - Time out miliseconds.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.

    • stream

      public void stream(LineInputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      Write from given InputStream.

      Used for DATA deliveries.

      Implements dot stuffing.

      Parameters:
      inputStream - Input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.
      See Also:
      • RFC 5321 #4.5.2

    • stream

      public void stream(LineInputStream inputStream, int slowBytes, int slowWait) throws IOException
      Write from given InputStream.

      Implements slow delivery.

      Parameters:
      inputStream - Input stream.
      slowBytes - Size of bytes.
      slowWait - Time out miliseconds.
      Throws:
      IOException - Unable to communicate.

    • startTLS

      public void startTLS(boolean client) throws SmtpException
      Enable encryption for the given socket.

      If a security policy is set in the session, it will be enforced during TLS negotiation.
      DANE policies require certificate validation against TLSA records.
      MTA-STS policies require standard PKI validation.

      Parameters:
      client - True if in client mode.
      Throws:
      SmtpException - SMTP delivery exception.

    • getSecurityPolicy

      protected SecurityPolicy getSecurityPolicy()
      Gets security policy from session (if this is a Connection).

      Default implementation returns null. Connection overrides this.

      Returns:
      SecurityPolicy or null.

    • close

      public void close()
      Close socket.
